s0355: In the fourth year, we fought Qin at Gao'an and defeated them.
s0356: In the fifth year, we attacked Qi at Juan.
s0358: We attacked Zheng, defeated them, and gave it to Han. Han gave us a long son.
s0359: In the sixth year, Zhongshan built the long wall.
s0360: We attacked Wei, defeated them at Mian Ze, and besieged King Hui of Wei.
s0361: In the seventh year, we invaded Qi, reaching the long wall.
s0363: In the eighth year, we and Han divided Zhou into two.
s0364: In the ninth year, we fought Qi at E Xia.
s0365: In the tenth year, we attacked Wei and took Zhen.
s0366: In the eleventh year, Qin attacked Wei, and we rescued them at Shi E.
s0367: In the twelfth year, Qin attacked Wei's Shao Liang, and we rescued them.
s0368: In the thirteenth year, Qin Xian Gong sent the Grand Master Guo to attack Wei's Shao Liang, capturing their crown prince and Ang.
s0369: Wei defeated us at Hui, taking Pi Lao.
s0370: Marquis Cheng met with Marquis Zhao of Han at Shangdang.
s0371: In the fourteenth year, we and Han attacked Qin.
s0372: In the fifteenth year, we aided Wei in attacking Qi.
s0373: In the sixteenth year, we and Han and Wei divided Jin, enfeoffing the Jin lord with Duan Shi.
s0374: In the seventeenth year, Marquis Cheng met with King Hui of Wei at Ge Nie.
s0375: In the nineteenth year, we met with Qi and Song at Ping Lu, and met with Yan at E.
s0376: In the twentieth year, Wei offered rong chuan wood, and we used it to build Tan Terrace.
s0377: In the twenty-first year, Wei besieged our Handan.
s0378: In the twenty-second year, King Hui of Wei captured our Handan, and Qi also defeated Wei at Gui Ling.
s0379: In the twenty-fourth year, Wei returned our Handan to us, and we formed an alliance with Wei on the Zhang River.
s0381: In the twenty-fifth year, Marquis Cheng died.
s0382: Prince Xi and crown prince Su Hou contended for the throne. Xi was defeated and fled to Han.
s0383: In Su Hou's first year, we took Duan Shi from the Jin lord and moved him to Tun Liu.
s0384: In the second year, we met with King Hui of Wei at Yin Jin.
s0385: In the third year, Prince Fan attacked Handan but failed and died.
s0386: In the fourth year, we paid court to the Son of Heaven.
s0387: In the sixth year, we attacked Qi and captured Gao Tang.
s0388: In the seventh year, Prince Ke attacked Wei's Shou Yuan.
s0389: In the eleventh year, Qin Xiao Gong sent Shang Jun to attack Wei, capturing their general Prince Ang.
s0391: In the twelfth year, Qin Xiao Gong died, and Shang Jun died.
s0392: In the fifteenth year, we built Shou Ling.
s0394: In the sixteenth year, Su Hou toured Da Ling, going out through Lu Men. Da Wu Wu held his horse and said: 'Farming matters are urgent - one day not worked means a hundred days without food.'
s0395: Su Hou got off his chariot and apologized.
s0396: In the seventeenth year, we besieged Wei's Huang but did not capture it.
s0398: In the eighteenth year, Qi and Wei attacked us. We released river water to flood them, and the troops withdrew.
s0399: In the twenty-second year, Zhang Yi became prime minister of Qin.
s0400: Zhao Ci fought Qin and was defeated. Qin killed Ci west of the river and took our Lin and Li Shi.
s0401: In the twenty-third year, Han Ju fought with Qi and Wei and died at Sang Qiu.
s0402: In the twenty-fourth year, Su Hou died.
s0403: His son Wu Hou ascended the throne.
s0404: Wu Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0405: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0406: In the fourth year, we attacked Qi and captured Yang Ping.
s0407: In the fifth year, Wu Hou died.
s0408: His son Wen Hou ascended the throne.
s0409: Wen Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0410: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0411: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Fan Wu.
s0412: In the fourth year, Wen Hou died.
s0413: His son Jing Hou ascended the throne.
s0414: Jing Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0415: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0416: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Shou Yuan.
s0417: In the fourth year, Jing Hou died.
s0418: His son Su Hou ascended the throne.
s0419: Su Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0420: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0421: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Fan Wu.
s0422: In the fourth year, Su Hou died.
s0423: His son Zhao Hou ascended the throne.
s0424: Zhao Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0425: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0426: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Shou Yuan.
s0427: In the fourth year, Zhao Hou died.
s0428: His son Xiaocheng Hou ascended the throne.
s0429: Xiaocheng Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0430: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0431: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Fan Wu.
s0432: In the fourth year, Xiaocheng Hou died.
s0433: His son Daoxiang Hou ascended the throne.
s0434: Daoxiang Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0435: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0436: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Shou Yuan.
s0437: In the fourth year, Daoxiang Hou died.
s0438: His son Wuling Hou ascended the throne.
s0439: Wuling Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0440: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0441: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Fan Wu.
s0442: In the fourth year, Wuling Hou died.
s0443: His son Huiwen Hou ascended the throne.
s0444: Huiwen Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0445: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0446: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Shou Yuan.
s0447: In the fourth year, Huiwen Hou died.
s0448: His son Xiaowen Hou ascended the throne.
s0449: Xiaowen Hou's first year, we attacked Zhongshan.
s0450: In the second year, we attacked Yan.
s0451: In the third year, we attacked Wei and captured Fan Wu.
s0452: In the fourth year, Xiaowen Hou died.
s0453: His son Su Hou ascended the throne.
